subject: Our apology
body:
Site Update:
 
Due to new laws, we will be required to ask for physician letters
for any orders made after April 30th.
Any existing clients will not have to worry about this, but
new clients are urged to order before the end of April.
If you order before or on April 30th then any future
orders will be exempt from this new law.
 
Sorry for any inconvenience.
 
Further information:
http://The00.luzeurletizmbre.com
 
 
Marian Ruggiero
Director of Sales
VigCil.Inc
 




Reminder: If you would like to place another order with us today then we would like to offer you a 35% discount.

Please follow the link below to receive this offer:
http://The00.luzeurletizmbre.com
